Subskills.name: Forceful Rip
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of annihilation.

Subskills.name: Attack Force by Force
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by annihilation.

Subskills.name: Rusted Chains
Subskills.description: Increases damage based on targets current life and executes monsters below a life threshold.

Subskills.name: Serrated Annihilation
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to targets inflicted with serrated chains.

Subskills.name: Arena Controller
Subskills.description: Annihilation pulls monsters towards you with increased force.

Subskills.name: Everyone Gets it
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of annihilated targets.

Subskills.name: Total Annihilation
Subskills.description: Spin a large chain around you for a short duration dealing increased damage and stunning monsters on hit. The outer edge of the chain always critically hits.

Subskills.name: Rip the Wounds
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Deep Cuts
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Explosive Delivery
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a bloody explosion on hit.

Subskills.name: Symphony of Chains
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple spinning chains around you inflicting bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Megadeath
Subskills.description: Rain down large bombs at monsters on hit.
